query:
SELECT 
  s.id, s.session_token, s.filename, s.status, s.file_size,
  s.assembly_phase, s.assembly_progress, s.assembly_total_chunks,
  s.assembly_started_at,
  s.final_file_key, s.final_file_url,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM resumable_upload_chunks c WHERE c.session_id = s.id) as chunk_count,
  (SELECT c.storage_key FROM resumable_upload_chunks c WHERE c.session_id = s.id LIMIT 1) as sample_chunk_key
FROM resumable_upload_sessions s
WHERE s.status = 'completed' AND (s.assembly_phase IS NULL OR s.assembly_phase NOT IN ('complete'))
ORDER BY s.id DESC
LIMIT 10;

WHERE s.status = 'completed' AND (s.assembly_phase IS NULL OR s.assembly_phase NOT IN ('complete'))
